title: ShadowFang Advanced HUMINT Protocol
description: Advanced psychological operations training from classified ShadowFang archives

sections.title: Psychological Dominance
sections.anchor: Visualize yourself as the dominant figure in any room - feel the psychological weight
sections.narration: Command authority through presence. Control through influence. Build rapport, then leverage it.

timing.text: Fill the space. Own the moment.

sections.title: Counter-Surveillance Protocol
sections.anchor: Mirror tap - you see everything, they see nothing
sections.narration: Always watching. Never watched. Detect their patterns. Break your own.

timing.text: Scan without looking. Feel their eyes.

sections.title: Memory Palace Protocol
sections.anchor: Touch temple - access the palace immediately
sections.narration: Build mental architecture. Store secrets in rooms. Navigate at will.

timing.text: Construct the architecture in your mind.
Walk the familiar paths to stored knowledge.

sections.title: Master Compression (Delta)
sections.anchor: Say SHADOWFANG. Feel all protocols integrate into one unified system.
sections.narration: All systems converge. Psychological dominance, counter-surveillance, memory palace - unified in ShadowFang protocol.

timing.text: Feel the unified protocol activate in your consciousness.
